abstract: HKQuery  predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule:) Type MethodpredicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule:)iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+class func predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule: Bool) -> NSPredicate Parameters hasScheduleThe schedule status of the medication. Ex: True will match medications that have a reminders schedule set up in the Health App.
overview:
HKQuery  predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule:) Type MethodpredicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule:)iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+class func predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule: Bool) -> NSPredicate Parameters hasScheduleThe schedule status of the medication. Ex: True will match medications that have a reminders schedule set up in the Health App.

Creates a predicate for use with HKUserAnnotatedMedicationQuery.

Creates a query predicate that matches HKUserAnnotatedMedication objects that match the schedule status specified.

Type Method# predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
class func predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule: Bool) -> NSPredicate
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuery/predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule:)#parameters)

`hasSchedule`The schedule status of the medication. Ex: True will match medications that have a reminders schedule set up in the Health App.

## [Discussion](/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuery/predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(hasSchedule:)#discussion)

Creates a predicate for use with HKUserAnnotatedMedicationQuery.

Creates a query predicate that matches HKUserAnnotatedMedication objects that match the schedule status specified.
